text: however , near midnight it disappeared , or to use a more appropriate expression , " it went out , " like a huge glowworm . had it fled from us ? we were duty bound to fear so rather than hope so . but at 12:53 in the morning , a deafening hiss became audible , resembling the sound made by a waterspout expelled with tremendous intensity .

the canadian might have quoted a much lower price . so it was imperative to make contact with whatever beings were confined inside the plating of this machine . i searched its surface for an opening or a hatch , a " manhole , " to use the official term ; but the lines of rivets had been firmly driven into the sheet - iron joins and were straight and uniform .

no . a jolt told me that the nautilus had bumped the underbelly of the ice bank , still quite thick to judge from the hollowness of the accompanying noise . indeed , we had " struck bottom , " to use nautical terminology , but in the opposite direction and at a depth of 3,000 feet . that gave us 4,000 feet of ice overhead , of which 1,000 feet emerged above water . so the ice bank was higher here than we had found it on the outskirts . a circumstance less than encouraging .
" he appears young , and will be easy to educate , and we shall not be obliged to use force to subdue him , nor draw his teeth , as is sometimes done .

" i use only my chronometer , " captain nemo answered me . " at noon tomorrow , march 21 , if , after accounting for refraction , the sun 's disk is cut exactly in half by the northern horizon , that will mean i 'm at the south pole . "
" it 's marvelous , " i replied , " and i truly see , captain , how right you are to use this force ; it 's sure to take the place of wind , water , and steam . "
" but it would perhaps be a good thing to do it with this instrument , which is more perfect than that which you before used . "
" then could you not use this nitro - glycerine for loading firearms ? " asked the sailor .
